mapper.update:
UPDATE toa_archive_permission set
FOLDER_ID = #{folderId},
CATEGORY = #{category},
USER_ID = #{userId},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
WEIGHT = #{weight},
PERMISSION_VALUE = #{permissionValue}
where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(ID) FROM toa_archive_permission t where t.folder_id=#{folderId}

SELECT p.PERMISSION_VALUE permissionValue
FROM toa_archive_permission p, toa_archive_sub_permission s WHERE ((s.control_id = #{userId} and s.data_type=1) or (s.control_id = #{deptId} and s.data_type=2) or (s.control_id = #{orgId} and s.data_type=2)) and p.folder_id = #{folderId} and p.id=s.permission_id and p.delete_flag=0
